coverLetter:
Great day Team Trimmerwork,

My name is Mark J. Winter from Toronto, Ont, Canada.


It is my goal to connect, educate and help people by sharing my experiences with and the benefits of using prescribed Medical cannabis.


Three years ago, I began to suffer from chronic hip pain. I was prescribed various pharmaceutical medications that resulted in insomnia, thirty pounds of weight loss and anxiety to name just a few of the worst side effects. My doctor then sent me to a Cannabinoid Clinic where the doctor prescribed Nabilone (a synthetic cannabis). It was not effective at all and caused bouts of extreme drowsiness. Shortly after that I was prescribed cannabis and cannabis oil which began to have the best effect on my pain.

I'm experiencing great relief from the quality and variety of my medically prescribed cannabis products. All aspects of my life have been enriched. I am back in harmony with my health, home, work and social activities.


For the past twenty years I've been a sales manager for a textile importer in Toronto, Ontario. Sales training, key account management and trade shows have been a major part of my work. My main focus has been to create brand recognition, client rapport, development and retention.


For the past thirty five years I've been a student and an Instructor of Martial Arts for knowledge, discipline and skills training. Dealing with chronic pain, training has become an every day need for my optimum health. I have also been teaching Mindfulness and Meditation workshops to institutions, companies and individuals. The workshops over the last two years have been primarily focused on teaching mindfulness for pain and stress management.


In closing, I believe, with your products and people along with my story and skills set, that we would be able to help many people discover the healing power of Cannabis products.


Sincerely,

Mark J Winter
